title: My pixel won't recognize my backup on drive during setup ..can't get my phone setting and apps data
content:
This is so annoying and frustrating, my pixel won't recognize my backup on Google drive during setup. I can't get my phone setting back, my call logs, SMS, apps etc all with 
@Google but me.
I have tried every possible thing...multiple factory reset, followed steps on Google support...for backup from cloud, latest software update...
My contacts , photos are back ..but not phone settings
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
